 1990-16541990-07-270ND,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendment to the regulations concerning "GENERAL FUNERAL EXPENSES IN CANADA" and "SPECIAL FUNERAL EXPENSES", made by Order in Council P.C. 1967-1894 of October 5, 1967, as amended, and "TRANSPORTATION OF DEPENDENTS TO PLACE OF BURIAL", made by Order in Council P.C. 1979-10/512 of February 20, 1979, which regulations were issued by the Chief of the Defence Staff as articles 210.21, 210.22 and 210.225, respectively, of the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces.
